name.description: Name of the artboard. This would be visible to the user and users can specify names that can help them uniquely identfiy different Artboards.

originX.description: Origin X position - Base system is cartesian, relative to master page and origin in top, left (X increasing to right, Y increasing downwards)

originY.description: Origin Y position - Base system is cartesian, relative to master page and origin in top, left (X increasing to right, Y increasing downwards)

unit.description: Unit used for artboard coordinates (originX, originY, width and height). For example: inch, mm, pixel, pica, point (default is pixels)
